name: part_012
file: tmp_hololive English -Promise- 2nd Anniversary Concert： Promise 2 You 【#Promise2U】 [9hMVpcDYS-0]_gemini-3-pro-preview/reencoded/part_012.mov

scenes.description: IRyS and Hakos Baelz dancing during an instrumental break of the song 'X.U.'.
Camera pans over the virtual city stage set.
IRyS, Hakos Baelz, and Ouro Kronii talking to the audience and introducing merchandise.

subtitles.original: Yay!

subtitles.english: Oh, no, just... no, no.

subtitles.original: There's a surprise at the end, but, before that...
subtitles.english: There's a surprise at the end, but, before that...

subtitles.original: We have an announcement about merchandise! Check this out!
subtitles.english: We have an announcement about merchandise! Check this out!

subtitles.original: Yeah! It's the Hololive English -Promise- 2nd Anniversary Celebration Merch!
subtitles.english: Yeah! It's the Hololive English -Promise- 2nd Anniversary Celebration Merch!

subtitles.original: We're releasing merchandise to commemorate our second anniversary.
subtitles.english: We're releasing merchandise to commemorate our second anniversary.

subtitles.original: Let's take turns introducing the merch, shall we?
subtitles.english: Let's take turns introducing the merch, shall we?

subtitles.original: Yeah, yeah, yeah!
subtitles.english: Yeah, yeah, yeah!

subtitles.original: So first up is a Frame Art Board of our wonderful Key Visual...
subtitles.english: So first up is a Frame Art Board of our wonderful Key Visual...

subtitles.original: ...for the Promise 2nd Anniversary.
subtitles.english: ...for the Promise 2nd Anniversary.

subtitles.original: The frame part uses a luxurious sparkling paper and the printed illustration...
subtitles.english: The frame part uses a luxurious sparkling paper and the printed illustration...

subtitles.original: ...turns this into a high quality piece of art.
subtitles.english: ...turns this into a high quality piece of art.

subtitles.original: You definitely don't want to miss the chance to add it to your collection or room.
subtitles.english: You definitely don't want to miss the chance to add it to your collection or room.

subtitles.original: And guess what? You can even hang it on the wall!
subtitles.english: And guess what? You can even hang it on the wall!

subtitles.original: Oh my god! On the wall!
subtitles.english: Oh my god! On the wall!

subtitles.original: Next up are the Collection Cards for each of Promise!
subtitles.english: Next up are the Collection Cards for each of Promise!

subtitles.original: These cards feature an attractive design that are foil stamped on the front...
subtitles.english: These cards feature an attractive design that are foil stamped on the front...

subtitles.original: ...and you can choose each card individually, so be sure to collect all of them!
subtitles.english: ...and you can choose each card individually, so be sure to collect all of them!

subtitles.original: Gotta collect 'em all! Wow!
subtitles.english: Gotta collect 'em all! Wow!

subtitles.original: Next we also have Ring Necklaces!
subtitles.english: Next we also have Ring Necklaces!

subtitles.original: This design includes cute references and motifs for each of us.
subtitles.english: This design includes cute references and motifs for each of us.

subtitles.original: You can use it as either a ring or a necklace...
subtitles.english: You can use it as either a ring or a necklace...

subtitles.original: ...so feel free to change it up depending on the occasion.
subtitles.english: ...so feel free to change it up depending on the occasion.

subtitles.original: And next we have special porcelain tumblers with our designs on them.
subtitles.english: And next we have special porcelain tumblers with our designs on them.

subtitles.original: It features our talent colors on top of a black base.
subtitles.english: It features our talent colors on top of a black base.

subtitles.original: They are designed to have a unified look...
subtitles.english: They are designed to have a unified look...

subtitles.original: ...and I bet it will look so cool if you use several of these tumblers together...
subtitles.english: ...and I bet it will look so cool if you use several of these tumblers together...

subtitles.original: ...in like a drinking party or something.
subtitles.english: ...in like a drinking party or something.

subtitles.original: And lastly, we have a 2-Way Tote Bag.
subtitles.english: And lastly, we have a 2-Way Tote Bag.

subtitles.original: It's a 2-way design that can be used as both a shoulder bag and a tote bag.
subtitles.english: It's a 2-way design that can be used as both a shoulder bag and a tote bag.

subtitles.original: It's even designed to be used as a carry-on bag too.
subtitles.english: It's even designed to be used as a carry-on bag too.

subtitles.original: Perfect for traveling and convenience.
subtitles.english: Perfect for traveling and convenience.

subtitles.original: And to top it off, it has many pockets that will definitely be useful...
subtitles.english: And to top it off, it has many pockets that will definitely be useful...

subtitles.original: ...for storing small items, like other merch!
subtitles.english: ...for storing small items, like other merch!

subtitles.original: Pockets! Oh my god!
subtitles.english: Pockets! Oh my god!

subtitles.original: And that concludes the Promise 2nd Anniversary Merch introduction!
subtitles.english: And that concludes the Promise 2nd Anniversary Merch introduction!

subtitles.original: Yay! Let's get it! Onegai shimasu!
subtitles.english: Yay! Let's get it! Please!

subtitles.original: And with that, we're finally at the very last part.
subtitles.english: And with that, we're finally at the very last part.

subtitles.english: Sorry for keeping you guys waiting.

subtitles.english: We mentioned that there would be a special, you know, surprise or announcement earlier.

subtitles.english: Would you like to hear what it is?
